explanation: The report is correct. MISRA C 2023 Rule 17.8 states that a function parameter shall not be modified. In the function metal_softirq_set_enable the parameter irq (an int passed by value) is assigned to with irq -= cntr->irq_base;, which is a direct modification of the parameter variable and therefore violates Rule 17.8. (The pointer parameter cntr is only dereferenced, which is permitted; modifying the object pointed to would be allowed but not modifying the pointer itself.) Recommended fix: copy the parameter into a local variable (e.g. int idx = irq - cntr->irq_base;) and operate on that local variable instead of modifying irq.
